title: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of STU101 Administered as Adjunctive Therapy in Focal Onset Seizures in Pediatric and Adolescent Subjects Aged 2 to <18 Years

inclusion_highlights: History of uncontrolled focal onset seizures despite at least one prior ASM
